name: Galactic Frontiers: Defense Protocol
storyline: Stand as humanity's shield against relentless waves of cosmic foes in this gripping sci-fi tower defense game. Employ advanced weaponry and deploy strategic defenses to repel enemy hordes across the galaxy's expanse. Can you withstand the onslaught in Galactic Frontiers?
summary: Galactic Frontiers - Defense Protocol is an immersive tower defense game set in outer space, where players strategically fortify against waves of cosmic invaders using advanced technology and powerful towers.
